snippet.title: Firewing 64 Trailer
snippet.description:
Trailer for my 64-bit inspired 3D platforming title, Firewing 64! Complete with all of the action, powerups, collectibles, and platforming action that made the genre great.

Note: This trailer was made for v1.0 of the game. Many changes have since been made to it in v2.0 which are detailed on my blog post: http://www.studiobesus.com/massive-update-to-make-firewing-64-v2/

The latest version can be downloaded from:
My site: http://www.studiobesus.com/
IndieDB: http://www.indiedb.com/games/firewing-64

For updates, follow me on Twitter: https://twitter.com/StudioBesus
